creator: egmont@gmail.com
text:
httpd-2.2.3/docs/error/HTTP_VARIANT_ALSO_VARIES.html.var contains an "´"
in the Italian message which is not a valid html entity. I think it should be
"é" but a native Italian should confirm it.
The whole context is:
    Non è possibile accedere all'entità
    richiesta perché ` essa stessa
    una risorsa negoziabile.

creator: egmont@gmail.com
text:
Argh... sorry... typos... so the text contains an "`" (in the middle row) 
which is not valid, I guess it should be "è".

creator: tony@pc-tony.com
text:
Patch committed as per this PR, and now confirmed in an email to docs@h.a.o by
Massimo Roscio (see mail here:
http://marc.info/?l=apache-docs&m=118436632614945&w=2)


Thanks for the update.

--
Tony
